function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residual energy consumption due to community use of the building during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential for disease spread through community use","Mitigation":"Limiting non-essential community use of the building, implementing energy-efficient appliances and lighting","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, energy-efficient appliances, smart lighting systems","People":"Community members using the building, building occupants, local residents","Owner":"City Hall, building management"},{"Description":"Potential for disease spread through community use of the building","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing, implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, touchless fixtures, outdoor play areas","People":"Community members using the building, building occupants, local residents","Owner":"City Hall, building management"},{"Description":"Residual energy consumption in net-positive buildings during lockdown periods","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential for strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Implementing strict energy usage guidelines, promoting energy-efficient practices, educating building occupants","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, energy-efficient appliances, smart building management systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, energy providers","Owner":"City Hall, building management"}]}
